Module.module_desc: This module provides a boolean (true/false) way to choose which module(s) to display at runtime. A SQL Query is used to determine if the "true" modules or the "false" modules should be displayed to the user.

Info.Synopsis: A set of UserControls and other helpful utilities provided by the RefreshCache group.
Info.Description: Provides a full suite of UserControls, HttpHandlers and WebControls. This package is always available on any Arena installation that has the Package Management suite involved.
Info.Changelog:
Initial release of the RC.Utilities package. Includes the following elements:
FileUploader - Flash based upload WebControl that provides real-time user feedback. AjaxTask - Provides a method to perform long-running tasks in the background. JSImport - JavaScript Import. Provides a safe method of importing JS files.
